availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William C. Mitchell (Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James A. Mitchell and Jane M. Mitchell. Married to Mary Ann Walls Mitchell in Breckinridge County, Kentucky, on April 25, 1855. Father of William J. Mitchell, Ann Mitchell, James Mitchell, and Sarah Mitchell. Resident of Hancock County in 1850. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 277A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 1012.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville, p. 198D.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Hancock County Marriages.
